name: emarket
overview:
emarket is an online exchange for the FMCG industry.

Connect and trade real time through a neutral, interactive platform with manufacturers, wholesalers and retailers across the globe.

emarket removes the barriers to trade by taking care of door-to-door delivery, inspection of goods, pricing, payment and credit facilities.

The automated system allows users to compare the market on a like for like basis within seconds and make instant purchase decisions while saving time, effort, and cost. Offers are personalised and show a delivered price to your depot.

As a seller, emarket enables you to cost effectively market, sell, and distribute your products to purchasing decision-makers from chain stores, buying groups, independents and alternate distribution channels at a single click.
